title: University of Connecticut
author: Bak
description: It's simple enough, UConn is a great university. But it's more than that. A top-ranked research institution, campuses across Connecticut built to inspire, the global community that is UConn Nation.
cleaned_text: Sustainable Future Powered by Clean Energy Innovating to Secure a Sustainable Future Powered by Clean Energy Champions in everything we do. From the research lab to the court, pushing limits is in Huskies' DNA. We embrace every challenge, whether sustaining energy for the game or for the planet. At UConn, brilliant minds and the dynamic global community that is UConn Nation come together to drive toward a brighter tomorrow. University News Featured Video Follow Us And learn what it's like to be a student today, Husky forever.
